title: [BUG] Tizen application crashes
body:
**Description**

<!-- a general description goes here -->
```

Exception
System.EntryPointNotFoundException: Unable to find an entry point named 'sk_refcnt_safe_unref' in shared library 'libSkiaSharp'.
at SkiaSharp.SkiaApi.sk_refcnt_safe_unref(IntPtr refcnt)
at SkiaSharp.SKObject.DisposeNative()
at SkiaSharp.SKNativeObject.Dispose(Boolean disposing)
at SkiaSharp.SKObject.Dispose(Boolean disposing)
at SkiaSharp.SKSurface.Dispose(Boolean disposing)
at SkiaSharp.SKNativeObject.DisposeInternal()
at SkiaSharp.SKNativeObject.Dispose()
at SkiaSharp.Views.Tizen.SKCanvasView.OnDrawFrame()
at SkiaSharp.Views.Tizen.CustomRenderingView.<.ctor>b__4_1(IntPtr d, IntPtr o)
at Tizen.Applications.CoreBackend.UICoreBackend.Run(String[] args)
at Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.Run(String[] args)
at Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.Run(String[] args)
```

**Code**

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

**Expected Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**

Crash

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 2.80.0-alpha.4<!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue -->
- Last known good version:  1.68.2-preview.43 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Tizen:  5.5 Simulator<!-- the version of the Tizen SDK you are compiling against, e.g. 4.0 --> 

**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**
